Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdb[9 tables]+---------+| user    || address || admin   || config  || dept    || friend  || news    || topic   || vote    |+---------+Database: Microsoft_Access_masterdbTable: admin[4 columns]+----------+-------------+| Column   | Type        |+----------+-------------+| id       | numeric     || ip       | non-numeric || password | non-numeric || username | non-numeric |+----------+-------------+


部分表！







发现编辑器数据库默认地址
